thread.title: Jackie
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Jackie

author: Jackie
title: Jackie
text:
Mom and I were searching all over town for the eye-catcher. As a last minute stop before home, we decided to pop in and have a look around. Well it didn't take long and we found the perfect piece for Moms TV.
I want to thank the lovely Lady who helped us and also, the Supervisor who sold us the floor model.
Thanks So Much, were very Happy and most definitely will shop with you again. Spanish Trace.
